welcomePage.title: Eclipse-Games
welcomePage.intro: The goal of this project is to provide several games as plugins for Eclipse platform. Those plugins are well integrated in the IDE environment and provide amusement to the development community.
welcomePage.item:
Which are the games? Currently, these are the games included:
- Minesweeper. To start the game choose: Games -> Minesweeper. You can check the Help.
- Minesweeper II. To start the game choose: Games -> Minesweeper II. You can check the Help.
- Snake. To start the game choose: Games -> Snake. You can check the Help.
- Sokoban. To start the game choose: Games -> Sokoban. You can check the Help.
Note: If you don't see the Games menu, reset the perspective: Window -> Reset Perspective.
Learn More This is the official site of Eclipse-Games: http://eclipse-games.sourceforge.net
Reporting bugs, comments If you experience any bug, please let me know. For enhancements and other requests, please contact me at jmordax@terra.es. Please feel free to also send me your comments.
